title: Configuration property
description: Configurations for a particular property of a model.

initialValue.description: Provide an intial value for a property, if no model is passed to a form. In case no model is provided, a pseudo-model will be built from these values.

title.description: Title used for this property in various places. If no title is provided, the name of this property will be used as the title (with a capitalized first letter).

labelKey.description: If this value is provided, it will be used to label this property in various places. It will also be used as a label for options in case this property is presented as a select field. Any sub-property name of this property (also accepts nested properties, e.g. 'name.lastName'). If no value is provided, the value of this property will be used as is. Do not provide a label key for properties, whose values are primitive.

display.description: Display configuration for this property. If no value is provided, a set of minimal default values will be generated.

edit.description: Edit configuration for this property. If no value is provided, a set of minimal default values will be generated.
